redis.metaparser_aviaparser_lock: aviaparser semaphore lock to get tasks from vertica
redis.metaparser_aviaparser_: aviaparser saved cvs; the key format: metaparser_aviaparser_skyscanner_RTW_MOW_2017-02-14_

riak.metaparser/aviaparser_config: aviaparser basic config: concurrency, sites among other things
riak.metaparser/cron_config: cron configs: parsers, active, schedule times
